Sandlurker lizards! They're under the same curse as all the other animals.

Poor, unfortunate creatures. The only thing to do is to eliminate them and sell their valuable, valuable hides.

Tragic.

I'm afraid they're much too big for me, so I'll need you to handle them. Bring back the hides and I'll give you a cut.

Also, be sure not to mention that you've seen me.

Fantastic! These will sell for...well, the most important thing is that those cursed creatures aren't hurting people anymore.

That's my main concern, of course.

I can't sell air, .

Not yet, anyway...but that's not a terrible idea....

I'll get to work on that plan. You bring me some hides.
